job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.

   Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.

   This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.

   In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.

   What you will be doing

     * AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
     * Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Answering the same questions over and over again
     * Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
     * Writing knowledge base articles, * Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills
job_details.full_text:
Network Support Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.

   Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.

   This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.

   In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.

   What you will be doing

     * AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
     * Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Answering the same questions over and over again
     * Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
     * Writing knowledge base articles, * Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI tools to enhance operational efficiency and automate tasks within a network support context. While it mentions AI systems and AI-driven systems, it does not describe the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of core AI models (like LLMs or diffusion models) or the underlying AI research and development. The role appears to be about leveraging existing AI tools for network support rather than building or engineering AI itself. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it primarily focuses on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity and is not a core AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The job description starts by outlining the business problem of operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction in the telecommunications industry, and how AI can solve these issues. It also mentions contributing to strategic decisions and elevating customer support.
job_tasks.phrase: In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually.

job_tasks.justification: The description highlights how the company is revolutionizing the landscape by leveraging AI to automate tasks and enhance efficiency and satisfaction, indicating a strategic business goal.
job_tasks.phrase: Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, which are foundational software development and system administration skills.
job_tasks.phrase: If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves implementing and managing AI-driven systems, which implies operationalizing and maintaining these systems in a production environment.
job_tasks.phrase: In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

job_tasks.justification: The description states that the candidate will analyze data to derive actionable insights, which is a key aspect of data engineering and analysis.
job_tasks.phrase: analyze data to derive actionable insights

job_tasks.justification: Managing incidents to ensure timely resolution is a critical part of operations engineering and maintaining system uptime.
job_tasks.phrase: manage incidents to ensure timely resolution

job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools requires software development skills.
job_tasks.phrase: AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.

job_tasks.justification: Configuring and maintaining network functions, even with AI tools, falls under system configuration and maintenance, which is part of software/system development and operations.
job_tasks.phrase: Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills' directly links technical work to business outcomes.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills

soft_skills.phrase: proactively reshaping the entire support process
crucial part of our dynamic team
manage incidents to ensure timely resolution
